A, B, C = map(int, input().split())




print(max(0, C - (A - B)))


# read input
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

# calculate amount of water in bottle 2
bottle2 = c - (a - b)

# print result
print(max(0, bottle2))

A, B, C = map(int, input().split())
print(max(0, C - (A - B)))


def main():
    a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
    bottle2 = c - (a - b)
    print(max(0, bottle2))

main()


A, B, C = map(int, input().split())





























































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































print(max(0, C - (A - B)))

A, B, C = map(int, input().split())

print(max(0, C - (A - B)))

# Read input
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

# Calculate amount of water in bottle 2
bottle2 = c - (a - b)

# Print result
print(max(0, bottle2))
